tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V3.2.2.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP19 Warriors on the Moon 月面の戦士たち, Getsumen no Senshi-tachi)
programme.desc: Kanata a.k.a. Ultraman Decker is thrown into another dimension by the extradimensional being Yapool! Just where in space has he been sent to? Kengo a.k.a. Ultraman Trigger comes to the rescue. Kanata and Kengo enjoy a moving reunion on the TPU's Lunar Base, but Yapool's evil reach isn't far behind...

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP20 Lord Ragon らごんさま, Ragon-sama)
programme.desc: An incident of an attacking from an unidentified monster takes place in a modern city, built where it which was once an ocean, Wadatsumi City!! Kaizaki and Ichika are immediately sent to investigate. The pair find a suspicious old woman, a mysterious girl, a crowd wearing peculiar masks, and a strange green creature. Is this a place where myterious events gather?!

programme.title: Ultraman Taiga The Movie (New Generation Climax)
programme.desc: Hiroyuki Kudo, working at the private security organization EGIS, has the power to transform into three Ultra Heroes: Taiga, Titas, and Fuma. Battling and defeating many enemies together, the bond between Hiroyuki and Taiga has deepened. However, someone has been targeting Hiroyuki. Noticing this, the New Generation Heroes come together to save him. Hikaru, Sho, Daichi, Gai, Riku, Katsumi, Isami, and even Taiga’s father Ultraman Taro have all come down to Earth. However, Ultraman Taro violently attacks his son Taiga. What happened to Taro? Will Taiga be able to fight against his father!? The New Generation Heroes now stand together to confront a bigger, darker power!

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep13)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep14)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep15)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep16)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep17)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep18)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Taiga The Movie (New Generation Climax)
programme.desc: Hiroyuki Kudo, working at the private security organization EGIS, has the power to transform into three Ultra Heroes: Taiga, Titas, and Fuma. Battling and defeating many enemies together, the bond between Hiroyuki and Taiga has deepened. However, someone has been targeting Hiroyuki. Noticing this, the New Generation Heroes come together to save him. Hikaru, Sho, Daichi, Gai, Riku, Katsumi, Isami, and even Taiga’s father Ultraman Taro have all come down to Earth. However, Ultraman Taro violently attacks his son Taiga. What happened to Taro? Will Taiga be able to fight against his father!? The New Generation Heroes now stand together to confront a bigger, darker power!

programme.title: Ultraman Blazar (EP05 The Mountain Roars 山が吠える, Yama ga Hoeru)
programme.desc: Practice runs for the new railgun, Mega Shot, is conducted in Anri's hometown. That's where Anri has an unexpected reunion with her childhood friend, Mizuho. Mizuho begs for them to cancel the practice runs. She insists that the removal of the shrine for the installation of the Mega Shot will awaken Dorgo, the local guardian god, but Anri finds it hard to believe. However, during the practice there's a big earth tremor...

programme.title: Ultraman Blazar (EP06 The Invading Aurora 侵略のオーロラ, Shinryaku no Ōrora)
programme.desc: Yasunobu was rambling about his day to Cururu, a washer at the laundromat, when Alien Cannan Herbie suddenly appears before him. Herbie uses the Aurora Beam to manipulate machines and this was the reason for the increasing car and airplane accidents around the world. And that's not the end of it: it turns out that Earth Garon had also been shot with the Aurora Beam! What will Yasunobu do?

programme.title: Ultraman Blazar (EP07 Rainbow Appears: Part 1 虹が出た（前編）, Niji ga Deta (Zenpen))
programme.desc: Upside-down rainbows are being sighted throughout Japan. They are said to herald the onset of rain. Gento suspects that a kaiju may be behind this and decides to visit Professor Yokomine, a leading kaijuologist and also his mentor from school. Yokomine tells him about Nijikagachi, a god-like being that can at times bless the land with rain and at times summon utter destruction. That's when Gento receives news about an appearance of a giant kaiju!

programme.title: Ultraman Blazar (EP08 Rainbow Appears: Part 2 虹が出た（後編）, Niji ga deta (Kōhen))
programme.desc: The typhoons that Nijikagachi created are about to wash away civilization. Gento decides to deploy Earth Garon's new Mod.2 unit into battle to defeat Nijikagachi. Teruaki, who had a deep respect for Yokomine, goes to persuade the mastermind of the plot.

programme.title: Ultraman Blazar (EP09 Planet of Music オトノホシ, Otonohoshi)
programme.desc: Anri receives a letter. It contained a concert ticket for a band led by Hoichi Tsukushi, someone that Anri had gotten to know through music. That's when the robot kaiju Garamon appears from a meteorite that came from outer space. Anri realizes that Garamon's behavior is controlled by a mysterious sound wave, and she has a hunch...

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP22 The Fall of Bazdo 衰亡のバズド, Suibō no Bazudo)
programme.desc: Fugitive Agams suddenly reaches out to GUTS-Select and Captain Murahoshi is called to Agams’ hideout alone… Finally, Agams reveals the truth of the shocking events from the future timeline?! What does he mean by “Earthlings’ crime”? Can Kanata and GUTS-Select finally take Agams into custody?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP23 The Sky of Despair 絶望の空, Zetsubō no Sora)
programme.desc: Agams is an entirely different person after his fight with Decker. Kanata searches how to save Agams from himself, meeting with the captured fugitive. They have a peaceful talk for the first time in a while gives Kanata a glimpse of Agams’ true feelings… But suddenly Sphere attacks, ruining the moment, and then an ominous, great shadow appears?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP24 End of a Dream 夢の果て, Yume no Hate)
programme.desc: 3 hours left until the Sphere Barrier starts to shrink. The 3 hours is the last hours of hope for humanity! To destory the Sphere Oblelisks, Kanata and GUTS-Select start a joint operation with TPU. However, the Terraphaser stands before them...! What will Kanata do to save Agams!?

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP25 The Light Far Beyond 彼方の光, Kanata no Hikari)
programme.desc: As Earth's apocalypse approaches, the injured GUTS-Select members puts their final plan into action in hopes to defeat Mother Spheresaurus! Will Kanata and the others be able to move forward to the future!? And what awaits them there!?

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP01 Day of the Attack (襲来の日, Shūrai no hi)
programme.desc: Several years after the world was saved by Ultraman Trigger, mankind has turned its gaze skywards to space. Suddenly, unidentified orbs dubbed “Sphere” invade! They begin their attack on Earth. Asumi Kanata, son of a rice cracker grocer, witnesses this tragedy unfold before him, and vows to protect the people. As he does, he is enveloped in light! And the new form he takes on... Is it a new Ultraman?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP02 Kanata's Resolve 決意のカナタ, Ketsui no Kanata)
programme.desc: Kanata enters the TPU training school, and begins marching drills with classmates Ichika and Ryumon. However, he and Ryumon start butting heads after a difference in opinion... Just then, Deathdrago appears before them! Will Kanata pull through this deadly situation? And can the three of them become members of GUTS-Select?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP03 Move Out, GUTS-Select! 出動! GUTS-Select, Shutsudō! Gattsu Serekuto)
programme.desc: A new aircraft GUTS Hawk deploys to GUTS-Select. To fully utilize its power, GUTS-Select need to coordinate with the Hawk's AI pilot, HANE2! But communicating with HANE2 proves a difficult task for Kanata and his team mates …. The sudden appearance of Gomora only adds to their difficulties. Don't give up, Decker! Use your new power to save the day!

programme.title: Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Absolute Conspiracy
programme.desc: Together with Ultraman Max, Ultraman Ribut senses a strange presence on a certain planet... However, it's a trap set by an enemy seeking revenge.

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP20)
programme.desc: Killer The Beatstar - Part 1: The Steel Army (キラー ザ ビートスター パート①「鋼鉄の軍団」, Kirā Za Bītosutā Pāto Wan - Kōtetsu no Gundan)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP21)
programme.desc: Killer The Beatstar - Part 2: The Steel Dictator (キラー ザ ビートスター パート②「鋼の独裁者」, Kirā Za Bītosutā Pāto Tsu - Hagane no Dokusai-sha)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP23)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero - Hero Retsuden (ウルトラマンゼロ 英雄列伝, Urutoraman Zero Eiyū Retsuden): The same as episode 79 of Ultraman Retsuden, this episode highlights clips from multiple Zero movies and specials

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP24)
programme.desc: Ultra Zero Fight - Shining Zero (Part 1) (ウルトラゼロファイト 輝きのゼロ（前編）, Urutora Zero Faito Kagayaki no Zero (Zenpen))

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP25)
programme.desc: Ultra Zero Fight - Shining Zero (Part 2) (ウルトラゼロファイト 輝きのゼロ（後編）, Urutora Zero Faito Kagayaki no Zero (Kōhen))

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP26)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero! Determination of a New Battle!! (ウルトラマンゼロ! 新たな戦いへの決意!!, Urutoraman Zero! Aratana Tatakai e no Ketsui!!): The final episode of Ultraman Retsuden, recapping the second part of Ultra Zero Fight.

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP01)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero VS Darklops Zero - Part 1: Multidimensional Threat! (ウルトラマンゼロVSダークロプスゼロ パート①「多次元の脅威！」, Urutoraman Zero VS Dākuropusu Zero Pāto Wan - Tajigen no Kyōi!)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP02)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero VS Darklops Zero - Part 2: Magic Bullet of Darkness (ウルトラマンゼロVSダークロプスゼロ パート②「暗黒の魔弾」, Urutoraman Zero VS Dākuropusu Zero Pāto Tsu - Ankoku no Madan)

programme.title: Ultra Galaxy Fight (The Destined Crossroad)
programme.desc: Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Destined Crossroad is the third installment of the Ultra Galaxy Fight series, continued from the previous series Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Absolute Conspiracy which had a shocking ending. Ultra Heroes vs Absolutian, the destined battle is about to reshape the galaxy!

programme.desc: Together with Ultraman Max, Ultraman Ribut senses a strange presence on a certain planet... However, it's a trap set by an enemy seeking revenge.

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP03)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero VS Darklops Zero - Part 3: Big Bang of Flame (ウルトラマンゼロVSダークロプス ゼロ パート ③ 「炎のビッグバン!」, Urutoraman Zero VS Dākuropusu Zero Pāto Tsuri - Honō no Bigguban!)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP04)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero THE MOVIE: Super Deciding Fight! The Belial Galactic Empire: Chapter of Bonds (ウルトラマンゼロ THE MOVIE 超決戦!ベリアル銀河帝国 絆の章, Urutoraman Zero THE MOVIE: Chōkessen! Beriaru Ginga Teikoku Kizuna no Shō)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP05)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero THE MOVIE: Super Deciding Fight! The Belial Galactic Empire: Chapter of Flame (ウルトラマンゼロ THE MOVIE 超決戦!ベリアル銀河帝国 炎の章, Urutoraman Zero THE MOVIE: Chōkessen! Beriaru Ginga Teikoku Honō no Shō)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP06)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero THE MOVIE: Super Deciding Fight! The Belial Galactic Empire: Chapter of Mirrors (ウルトラマンゼロ THE MOVIE 超決戦!ベリアル銀河帝国 鏡の章, Urutoraman Zero THE MOVIE: Chōkessen! Beriaru Ginga Teikoku Kagami no Shō)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP07)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero THE MOVIE: Super Deciding Fight! The Belial Galactic Empire: Chapter of Steel (ウルトラマンゼロ THE MOVIE 超決戦!ベリアル銀河帝国 鋼の章, Urutoraman Zero THE MOVIE: Chōkessen! Beriaru Ginga Teikoku Hagane no Shō)

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP23. Prelude to a Nightmare 悪夢へのプレリュード, Akumu e no Pureryūdo)
programme.desc: STORAGE has developed the 4th Special Airborne Armor, Ultroid Zero, based on analysis of Ultraman! Yoko is chosen as its pilot, but on the day of its launch test, monsters begin to rampage all over the place! In the face of a monster attack of unprecedented scale, STORAGE unveils their most powerful robot to show off its true strength!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP24. The Game to Extinction 滅亡への遊戯, Metsubō e no Yūgi)
programme.desc: Juggler has finally revealed his true form to Haruki. Meanwhile, Celebro puts his final plan into motion. With their respective objectives out in the open, the situation takes a turn for the worse! As the shadow of despair creeps closer, their final enemy appears as a nightmare given shape!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP25. Warriors Shining Beyond 遥かに輝く戦士たち, Haruka ni Kagayaku Senshi-tachi)
programme.desc: In the face of a brutal assault by the formidable Destrudos, Haruki and Ultraman Z are gravely injured. Meanwhile, STORAGE attempts a desperate, all-out attack in order to rescue Yoko, who has fallen into the enemy’s clutches!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP01. Chant My Name! ご唱和ください、我の名を!, Goshōwa Kudasai, Ware no Na wo!)
programme.desc: Haruki Natsukawa is a pilot for Global Allied Forces Japan’s robot unit, STORAGE. As he fights day and night to keep the peace on Earth, a new Ultra Hero alights before him! That hero’s name is Ultraman Z. He’s a hot-blooded hero who introduces himself as the disciple of Ultraman Zero. In the face of the Ferocious Space Shark Genegarg’s onslaught, the two imperiled heroes become one, and the story of Ultraman Z begins!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP02. A Warrior's Principle 戦士の心得, Senshi no Kokoroe)
programme.desc: The Invisible Monster Neronga appears to consume electricity while appearing and disappearing at the same time. STORAGE were sent to deal with the monster. Haruki struggles with Neronga, which absorbs the electric power of Sevenger. STORAGE devises a new strategy to defeat Neronga. Will Haruki and Z be able to capture Neronga?

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP03. Live Coverage! The Monster Transport Operation 生中継!怪獣輸送大作戦, Nama Chūkei! Kaijū Yusō Dai Sakusen)
programme.desc: STORAGE was ordered to transport the ancient monster, Gomora to an uninhabited island after a construction company discover it in a mountain. Haruki heads out in Sevenger, but Gomora suddenly awakens! Haruki has no choice but to stop its rampage!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP04. Robot-2 Activation Plan 生二号ロボ起動計画, Nigō Robo Kidō Keikaku)
programme.desc: Anti-monster robot force STORAGE's new asset, Special Craft No. 2, Windom, is finally complete. However, a problem with its energy charge prevents it from being launched. Meanwhile, the Subterranean Monster Telesdon rampages on the surface! Even worse, Telesdon is given a boost by a mysterious power! Can STORAGE and Ultraman Z overcome this challenge?!

programme.title: Ultra Galaxy Fight (The Destined Crossroad)
programme.desc: Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Destined Crossroad is the third installment of the Ultra Galaxy Fight series, continued from the previous series Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Absolute Conspiracy which had a shocking ending. Ultra Heroes vs Absolutian, the destined battle is about to reshape the galaxy!

programme.desc: Ultraman Zero VS Darklops Zero - Part 3: Big Bang of Flame (ウルトラマンゼロVSダークロプス ゼロ パート ③ 「炎のビッグバン!」, Urutoraman Zero VS Dākuropusu Zero Pāto Tsuri - Honō no Bigguban!)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP04)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero THE MOVIE: Super Deciding Fight! The Belial Galactic Empire: Chapter of Bonds (ウルトラマンゼロ THE MOVIE 超決戦!ベリアル銀河帝国 絆の章, Urutoraman Zero THE MOVIE: Chōkessen! Beriaru Ginga Teikoku Kizuna no Shō)

programme.title: Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Absolute Conspiracy
programme.desc: Together with Ultraman Max, Ultraman Ribut senses a strange presence on a certain planet... However, it's a trap set by an enemy seeking revenge.

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP10. Here Comes the Space Pirate! 宇宙海賊登場, Uchū Kaizoku Tōjō)
programme.desc: The space pirate, Alien Barossa sneaks into STORAGE to retrieve King Joe! This space pirate is known for using various robbed tools and weapons from space and is a powerful enemy! In addition, King Joe is about to move again! Can Haruki stop this pirate?

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP23. Prelude to a Nightmare 悪夢へのプレリュード, Akumu e no Pureryūdo)
programme.desc: STORAGE has developed the 4th Special Airborne Armor, Ultroid Zero, based on analysis of Ultraman! Yoko is chosen as its pilot, but on the day of its launch test, monsters begin to rampage all over the place! In the face of a monster attack of unprecedented scale, STORAGE unveils their most powerful robot to show off its true strength!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP24. The Game to Extinction 滅亡への遊戯, Metsubō e no Yūgi)
programme.desc: Juggler has finally revealed his true form to Haruki. Meanwhile, Celebro puts his final plan into motion. With their respective objectives out in the open, the situation takes a turn for the worse! As the shadow of despair creeps closer, their final enemy appears as a nightmare given shape!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP01. Chant My Name! ご唱和ください、我の名を!, Goshōwa Kudasai, Ware no Na wo!)
programme.desc: Haruki Natsukawa is a pilot for Global Allied Forces Japan’s robot unit, STORAGE. As he fights day and night to keep the peace on Earth, a new Ultra Hero alights before him! That hero’s name is Ultraman Z. He’s a hot-blooded hero who introduces himself as the disciple of Ultraman Zero. In the face of the Ferocious Space Shark Genegarg’s onslaught, the two imperiled heroes become one, and the story of Ultraman Z begins!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP03. Live Coverage! The Monster Transport Operation 生中継!怪獣輸送大作戦, Nama Chūkei! Kaijū Yusō Dai Sakusen)
programme.desc: STORAGE was ordered to transport the ancient monster, Gomora to an uninhabited island after a construction company discover it in a mountain. Haruki heads out in Sevenger, but Gomora suddenly awakens! Haruki has no choice but to stop its rampage!

programme.title: Ultra Galaxy Fight (The Destined Crossroad)
programme.desc: Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Destined Crossroad is the third installment of the Ultra Galaxy Fight series, continued from the previous series Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Absolute Conspiracy which had a shocking ending. Ultra Heroes vs Absolutian, the destined battle is about to reshape the galaxy!

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep23)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep24)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep25)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep01)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger: New Generation Tiga (Ep02)
programme.desc: Today, GUTS-Select team was formed while Martian settlement Kengo Manaka lived his life as a botanist. Kengo has a fated encounter the giant of light from the past, and his name is Ultraman Trigger.

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP05. First Juggling, ファースト・ジャグリング, Fāsuto Jaguringu)
programme.desc: A mysterious stone tool is found in Alaska. The Freezing Monster, Peguila appeared at a lab where this tool was under research. Yoko attempted to dispatch with Windom, but the mecha was frozen solid! Will this new tool help Ultraman Z and STORAGE in this battle?!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP06. The Man Returns! 帰ってきた男!, Kaettekita Otoko!)
programme.desc: A certain man has returned to Earth. His name is Riku Asakura, and 's the young man who transforms into Ultraman Geed. However, 's not the only one who has come to Earth. The Last Judgmenter Gillvalis, who once tormented Geed, has returned to Earth once again! don't look away as our two brave heroes face down an unprecedented crisis!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP07. His majesty's Medal 陛下のメダル, Heika no Medaru)
programme.desc: Riku Asakura was kidnapped by someone! Riku's hidden power is being used to create something evil...! And the enemy's powerful Belial Fusion Monster appears! As peril befalls out heroes, Ultraman Z's master, Ultraman Zero appears! Shatter the enemy's evil ambitions, Z, Geed, and Zero!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP08. The Mystic Power 神秘の力, Shinpi no Chikara)
programme.desc: One day mysterious beautiful sisters arrived from the far corners of the universe! The mysterious monster cells in their possession have created a Combined Monster known as Tri-King! Furthermore, Kaburagi strengthens this formation further by causing it to evolve into a Super Combined Monster known as Five King! There is no choice but to make use of a new kind of power in order to face this indomitable threat! That's right, harnessing the powers of a mysterious transforming light!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP09. The Unidentified Object Convoy Order 未確認物質護送指令, Mi Kakunin Busshitsu Gosō Shirei)
programme.desc: STORAGE members are assigned to escort Ultra Medals to a research institute under the GAF's orders. But aliens are also aiming for the Ultra Medals, which are said to be the treasure of the universe! How can STORAGE deal the enemy space robot King Joe and how will Ultraman Z face it?!

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP08)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero THE MOVIE: Super Deciding Fight! The Belial Galactic Empire: Chapter of Light (ウルトラマンゼロ THE MOVIE 超決戦!ベリアル銀河帝国 光の章, Urutoraman Zero THE MOVIE: Chōkessen! Beriaru Ginga Teikoku Hikari no Shō)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP09)
programme.desc: Ultraman Saga - Chapter 1: Silent Earth (ウルトラマンサーガ 「第1章 沈黙の地球」, Urutoraman Sāga - Dai Ichi Shō: Chinmoku no Chikyū)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP10)
programme.desc: Ultraman Saga - Chapter 2: Zero's Hardship (ウルトラマンサーガ 「第2章 ゼロの苦難」, Urutoraman Sāga - Dai Ni Shō: Zero no Kunan)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP11)
programme.desc: Ultraman Saga - Chapter 3: The Cocoon of Fear (ウルトラマンサーガ 「第3章 恐怖の繭」, Urutoraman Sāga - Dai San Shō: Kyoufu no Mayu)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP12)
programme.desc: Ultraman Saga - Chapter 4: Revival of The Hero (ウルトラマンサーガ 「第4章 復活の英雄」, Urutoraman Sāga - Dai Yon Shō: Fukkatsu no Eiyū)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP13)
programme.desc: Ultraman Saga - Chapter 5: The Real Fight (ウルトラマンサーガ 「第5章 本当の戦い」, Urutoraman Sāga - Dai Go Shō: Hontō no Tatakai)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP14)
programme.desc: Ultraman Mebius Battle File (ウルトラマンメビウスバトルファイル, Urutoraman Mebiusu Batoru Fairu): The only episode to not be largely re-used from the two Ultraman Retsuden seasons, this episode showcases Ultraman Mebius Gaiden: Ghost Rebirth. In newly-recorded footage, Rei makes a brief appearance at the end.

programme.title: Ultraman Trigger Episode Z
programme.desc: Two years have passed since the final battle and peace has been restored around the globe. However, things don't stay quiet for long when monsters once again begin to appear on Earth. At the same time, a series of mysterious break-ins take place at super ancient ruins around the world. Expert team GUTS-Select, led by a new captain, prepares the squad to launch an investigation. Little do they know, it is the beginning of a fierce battle with the fate of the universe in the balance. GUTS-Select and Ultraman Z rush into battle with our hero, Kengo Manaka, in the lead. A sinister figure emerges from the shadows: Evil Trigger, a sinister giant that inherits the shadow. To make everyone smile again, Ultraman Trigger and Haruki, human host of Ultraman Z, join forces with the new members of GUTS-Select as well as Ignis, human host of Trigger Dark, will take part in the ultimate battle between light and shadow!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP04 The Destructive Monster Awakens 破壊獣覚醒, Hakaijū Kakusei)
programme.desc: A mysterious giant capsule suddenly appears in a forgotten onsen (hot spring) town! Although, the mayor is taking pictures and looks oddly happy? Mons-Ahgar appears to throw GUTS-Select and the town further into chaos! Their hopes to save the day lie in promising new technology, and so Kanata and crew turn their efforts into combining the two GUTS aircrafts into one: the GUTS Gryphon!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP05 Glutton of the Lake 湖の食いしん坊, Mizu'umi no Kuishinbō)
programme.desc: Eleking suddenly appeared in the city! Ichika meets a mysterious girl named Yuko at the scene. Recently, Eleking has been stealing and eating electricity, but is there any connection between the two? In addition, there is something strange with Ichika's encounter with Yuko. Where will her straight forward feelings lead her?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP06 Subterranean Monster Appears! And Appears! 地底怪獣現わる! 現わる!, Chitei Kaijū Arawaru! Arawaru!)
programme.desc: A sazame bamboo flower, a harbinger of disaster blooms. A golden rainbow appears in the sky and a subterranean monster emerges. Ryumon is injured in this unprecedented situation. Kanata tries to cheer him up, but... What is Ryumon staring at?

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP07 The Light of Hope from the Red Planet 希望の光、赤き星より, Kibō no Hikari, Akaki Hoshi Yori)
programme.desc: A mysterious energy is detected underground. Could it be?! The power of darkness defeated ten years ago?! As Kanata and crew are stunned with shock, from the sky the legendary giant himself lands before GUTS-Select; Ultraman Trigger! Decker and Trigger, the two Giants of Light begin their fight against the power of darkness!!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP08 Light and Darkness, Again 光と闇, ふたたび, Hikari to Yami, Futatabi)
programme.desc: A mysterious giant plant appears and the pollen it spreads lures people into a world of dreams! But it looks just like R'lyeh, the plant Kengo Manaka grew to bring smiles to the people of Mars...?! A familiar face shows up as Kengo, Kanata, and crew try to take control of the situation, and the GUTS-Select joint extermination operations begins!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP09 Standing Tall for Someone Special 誰がための勇姿, Taga Tame no Yūshi)
programme.desc: Kanata meets a young girl, Mika. She says she wants Kanata/Ultraman Decker to fight her father?! Her father is the Space Martial Arts Champion, Grace... Will the duel between Decker and Grace take place? And how will it end?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP10 Man and Monster 人と怪獣, Hito to Kaijū)
programme.desc: The mysterious monster Neomegas appears suddenly in town, defeats several other monsters, and leaves. Vice-Captain Kaizaki tries to find out what's really going out, when she remembers the words of her mentor. The terrifying true meaning behind those words reveals itself before Kanata, the GUTS-Select team, and Ultraman Decker!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP11 Machine God Deployed 機神出撃, Kishin Shutsugeki)
programme.desc: Finally! Finally!! GUTS-Select are given with new equipment in the form of a robot! It's name is the "Terraphaser"!! Everyone is excited to meet the robot they'd been waiting for, but for some reason monsters appear every time they try to test a boot-up sequence!! As Ultraman Decker holds off the monsters, can the team safely start-up the Terraphaser?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP12 Neomegas Strikes Back ネオメガスの逆襲, Neomegasu no Gyakushū)
programme.desc: Sphere-Neomegas is born from the remaining Neomegas cells. Ultraman Decker and GUTS-Select are forced to fight against its overwhelming power. Kanata and his team are devastated by their inability to accomplish anything, but they encourage each other and begin a counterattack operation, mobilizing all their strength with Terraphaser at the center!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP05. First Juggling, ファースト・ジャグリング, Fāsuto Jaguringu)
programme.desc: A mysterious stone tool is found in Alaska. The Freezing Monster, Peguila appeared at a lab where this tool was under research. Yoko attempted to dispatch with Windom, but the mecha was frozen solid! Will this new tool help Ultraman Z and STORAGE in this battle?!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP06. The Man Returns! 帰ってきた男!, Kaettekita Otoko!)
programme.desc: A certain man has returned to Earth. His name is Riku Asakura, and 's the young man who transforms into Ultraman Geed. However, 's not the only one who has come to Earth. The Last Judgmenter Gillvalis, who once tormented Geed, has returned to Earth once again! don't look away as our two brave heroes face down an unprecedented crisis!

programme.desc: Riku Asakura was kidnapped by someone! Riku's hidden power is being used to create something evil...! And the enemy's powerful Belial Fusion Monster appears! programme.desc: Ultraman Channel will cease transmission on 1st of October at 00:00 hours. Astro customers can look forward to watching the Ultraman series and movies on Astro Ceria and On-Demand.
